official_title: Analysis of Patient Understanding of Radiation Therapy Among Patients With Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients 18 years or older with non-invasive or invasive breast cancer receiving consultation at the breast radiation oncology clinic for radiotherapy recommendations
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients under 18 years old or receiving palliative care
